messages.content: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI-Portrait-Maker project?
The ComfyUI-Portrait-Maker project is an adaptation of EasyPhoto that breaks down its process and aims to add a series of operations on human portraits in the future.
What are the main updates in version 1.2.0 of ComfyUI-Portrait-Maker?

In version 1.2.0, the PM_SuperColorTransfer node and PM_SuperMakeUpTransfer node were added to simplify the color transfer and makeup transfer processes, respectively. Additionally, the v1.2.0 workflow was introduced.
What is the purpose of the RetinaFace PM node in ComfyUI-Portrait-Maker?
The RetinaFace PM node performs matting using models from Model Scope to extract faces from images. It also supports face selection.
How does the FaceFusion PM node in ComfyUI-Portrait-Maker work?
The FaceFusion PM node merges faces from two images using either Ali's model or Roop's model for the merging process.
What is the function of the SuperMakeUpTransfer PM node in ComfyUI-Portrait-Maker?
The SuperMakeUpTransfer PM node is a multi-node integration that performs makeup transfer by merging two pictures.
How can users contribute to the development of the ComfyUI-Portrait-Maker project?
Users can contribute by creating a new feature branch, making changes, committing the changes, pushing to a remote branch, and creating a Pull Request (PR).
Under what license is the ComfyUI-Portrait-Maker project distributed?
The ComfyUI-Portrait-Maker project is licensed under the MIT License.
What is the purpose of ComfyUI-Portrait-Maker?
ComfyUI-Portrait-Maker is a project adapted from EasyPhoto. It breaks down the process of EasyPhoto and will add a series of operations for processing character portraits in the future.
What is the RetainFace PM node in ComfyUI-Portrait-Maker?
The RetainFace PM node uses the Model Scope model to perform matting. It takes an input image and has parameters for setting the face crop ratio and selecting a specific face index.
What does the FaceFusion PM node do in ComfyUI-Portrait-Maker?
The FaceFusion PM node blends the faces of two input images using either Ali's model or Roop's model for face fusion.
What is the function of the RatioMerge2Image PM node in ComfyUI-Portrait-Maker?
The RatioMerge2Image PM node merges two input images according to a specified fusion rate, with higher values favoring image1.
How does the MaskMerge2Image PM node work in ComfyUI-Portrait-Maker?
The MaskMerge2Image PM node merges two images using a mask to determine the areas to be replaced from image1 with content from image2.
What is the purpose of the ExpandMaskFaceWidth PM node in ComfyUI-Portrait-Maker?
The ExpandMaskFaceWidth PM node expands the width of a mask based on a specified ratio relative to the associated bounding box.
What is the SuperMakeUpTransferPM node in ComfyUI-Portrait-Maker?
The SuperMakeUpTransferPM node is an integration of multiple nodes that blends the makeup between two input images.
